title: Reducing optical reflection loss through textured PEDOT:PSS in hybrid Sn–Pb perovskite solar cells
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00029C, Paper
Shih-En Hsu, Wen-Xian Zhu, Dong-Tai Wu, Wen-Li Huang, Li-Ting Xue, Chi-Jing Huang, Chang-Hao Wang, Yun-Shan Li, Wei-Jia Qiu, Chieh-Ting Lin
This work introduces a pioneering method using polystyrene spheres to fabricate a textured PEDOT:PSS layer, which can notably reduce reflective losses in Sn–Pb PSCs and thus improve the power conversion efficiency.
